name: HelpAging
goal: HelpAging is a consultancy firm that provides consultation on health and heath care topics such as medical device and drug portfolio analysis and pharmaeconomics assessment  for pharma industry, insurance and investors as well as services and consultations around telemedecine, teleconsultation, mobile health telemonitoring and mobile health lifestyle coaching for the healthcare system.
interests: Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Food Safety, Humanitarian Aid, Information Society, Public Health, Research and Technology
euInitiatives:
Healthy and active ageing
Silver economy in Europe
